problem_names: lemma uncurry_simp[simp]: "uncurry f (a,b) = f a b"
lemma uncurry_curry_id: "uncurry \<circ> curry = id" "curry \<circ> uncurry = id"
lemma uncurry_split: "P (uncurry f p) \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>x1 x2. p = (x1, x2) \<longrightarrow> P (f x1 x2))"
lemma uncurry_split_asm: "P (uncurry f a) \<longleftrightarrow> \<not>(\<exists>x y. a = (x,y) \<and> \<not>P (f x y))"
lemma uncurry_case_stmt: "(case x of (a, b) \<Rightarrow> f a b) = uncurry f x"
translations: lemma uncurry_simp[simp]: "uncurry f (a,b) = f a b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. uncurry f (a, b) = f a b
lemma uncurry_curry_id: "uncurry \<circ> curry = id" "curry \<circ> uncurry = id"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. uncurry \<circ> curry = id &&& curry \<circ> uncurry = id
lemma uncurry_split: "P (uncurry f p) \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>x1 x2. p = (x1, x2) \<longrightarrow> P (f x1 x2))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P (uncurry f p) =
    (\<forall>x1 x2. p = (x1, x2) \<longrightarrow> P (f x1 x2))
lemma uncurry_split_asm: "P (uncurry f a) \<longleftrightarrow> \<not>(\<exists>x y. a = (x,y) \<and> \<not>P (f x y))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P (uncurry f a) = (\<nexists>x y. a = (x, y) \<and> \<not> P (f x y))
lemma uncurry_case_stmt: "(case x of (a, b) \<Rightarrow> f a b) = uncurry f x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (case x of (a, b) \<Rightarrow> f a b) = uncurry f x
